data.eml:eml: A new species and subgenus of Pachylaelaps Berlese from Turkey (Acari: Pachylaelapidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Özbek, Hasan Hüseyin, Mašán, Peter (2018): A new species and subgenus of Pachylaelaps Berlese from Turkey (Acari: Pachylaelapidae). Zootaxa 4418 (5): 481-492, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4418.5.5
